title: :: Reverse missiles and mild dental recovery with vitamin D
subtitle: Alternative health sites speak of the idea that a diet rich in vitamin D can help to replant lost materials due to cavity, but this claim depends on the misinterpretation of a paper published in 1932, and on science in general.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A diet rich in vitamin D can reflect tooth decay and regrowth parts of the teeth lost due to cavities.
